title: BOOK TO BE LAUNCHED ON JANUARY 23, 2012 AT TEMPLE TREES
content: The Book titled “The Dawn of Sri Lanka, The Miracle of Asia –Selected Essays on the Patriotic Legacy of President Mahinda Rajapaksa” would be launched on January 23, 2012 at the Temple Trees at 4.30 p.m. The Chief Guest would be His Excellency President Mahinda Rajapaksa. The Guests of Honour will Hon.Chamal Rajapaksa, Hon.Basil Rajapaksa,…
